SELECT T1.WARE_NO AS CODE_ID /* 창고번호 */ , T1.WARE_NM || CASE WHEN T1.WARE_USE_YN <> 'Y' /* 미사용인 경우만 (미사용) 표기 */ THEN ( SELECT '(' || MLNG_CNTN || ')' FROM T_CMZ_MLNG_D WHERE TENANT_ID = 'TNT_BASE' AND MLNG_ID = 'MSG_TXT_NUSD' AND LNG_ID = #{session.langId} ) END AS CODE_NAME /* 창고명 */ , T1.WARE_DV_CD /* 창고구분코드 */ FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ T1 /* 월별창고내역 */ WHERE T1.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM')
AND T1.WARE_DV_CD = #{wareDvCd}
AND T1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD IN ('20', '30')
AND T1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '20'
AND T1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '30'
ORDER BY T1.WARE_USE_YN DESC, TO_NUMBER(T1.SORT_DV_VAL), T1.WARE_NM, T1.WARE_NO

SELECT T3.OG_CD /* 조직코드 */ , T3.OG_NM /* 조직명 */ FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ T1 /* 월별창고내역 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T2 /* 파트너기본 */ ON T2.OG_TP_CD = T1.OG_TP_CD AND T2.PRTNR_NO = T1.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T3 /* 월조직내역 */ ON T3.BASE_YM = T1.APY_YM AND T3.OG_ID = T1.OG_ID AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE T1.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T1.WARE_NO = #{wareNo}

SELECT T1.SVPD_PD_CD AS CODE_ID /* CODEID */ , T1.SVPD_NM_ABBR1 AS CODE_NAME /* CODENAME */ , T1.SVPD_ITEM_KND AS ITM_KND /* 품목구분 */ FROM () T1 WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.SVPD_ITEM_KND = #{itmKnd} /* 상품 */
AND T1.SVPD_USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY T1.SVPD_ITEM_CD, T1.SVPD_PART_CD

SELECT T1.SVPD_PD_CD AS CODE_ID /* CODEID */ , T1.SVPD_NM_ABBR1 AS CODE_NAME /* CODENAME */ , T1.SVPD_ITEM_KND AS ITM_KND /* 품목구분 */ , T2.WARE_NO /* 창고번호 */ FROM () T1 INNER JOIN TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ T2 /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ ON T2.ITM_PD_CD = T1.SVPD_PD_CD WHERE T1.SVPD_ITEM_KND = #{itmKnd} /* 상품 */ AND T2.WARE_NO = #{wareNo} AND T1.SVPD_USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY T1.SVPD_PD_CD

SELECT D1.ITM_PD_CD AS CODE_ID /* CODEID */ , D2.PD_ABBR_NM AS CODE_NAME /* CODENAME */ , D3.PD_PRP_VAL19 AS ITM_KND /* 품목구분 */ , D1.WARE_NO /* 창고번호 */ FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ D1 /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS D2 /* 상품기본 */ ON D2.PD_CD = D1.ITM_PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL D3 /* 상품각사속성상세 */ ON D3.PD_CD = D2.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ D4 /* 월별창고내역 */ ON D4.WARE_NO = D1.WARE_NO WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.PD_TP_CD = 'M' AND D3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D3.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND ( D3.PD_PRP_VAL32 IS NULL OR D3.PD_PRP_VAL32 = 'Y' ) AND D3.PD_PRP_VAL19 = #{itmKnd} AND D4.APY_YM = SUBSTR(#{stFromYmd}, 1, 6) AND D4.WARE_DV_CD = #{wareDvCd}
AND D4.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '20'
AND D4.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '30'
ORDER BY D1.WARE_NO, D1.ITM_PD_CD

SELECT NVL(T1.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY, 0) AS PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY /* 시점재고A등급수량 */ , NVL(T1.PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY, 0) AS PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY /* 시점재고E등급수량 */ , NVL(T1.PITM_STOC_R_GD_QTY, 0) AS PITM_STOC_R_GD_QTY /* 시점재고R등급수량 */ , T2.ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , T4.PD_PRP_VAL19 AS ITM_KND /* 품목구분 */ , T4.PD_PRP_VAL05 AS MGT_UNIT /* 관리단위*/ FROM TB_SVST_MCITM_STOC_IZ T1 /* 월별품목재고내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ T2 /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ ON T2.WARE_NO = T1.WARE_NO AND T2.ITM_PD_CD = T1.ITM_PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T3 /* 상품기본 */ ON T3.PD_CD = T1.ITM_PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T4 /* 상품각사속성상세 */ ON T4.PD_CD = T3.PD_CD WHERE T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T3.PD_TP_CD = 'M' AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T4.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND ( T4.PD_PRP_VAL32 IS NULL OR T4.PD_PRP_VAL32 = 'Y' ) AND T1.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(#{stFromYmd}, 1, 6) AND T1.WARE_NO = #{wareNo} AND T2.ITM_PD_CD = #{itmPdCd} AND T4.PD_PRP_VAL19 = #{itmKnd}
